item.description:
Search Engine Marketing and AdWords presentation by Shubhada:
The Search Engine Marketing (SEM) presentation will go over the general concepts of SEM marketing.

The primary focus will be centered on creating and maintaining a SEM campaign within Google AdWords. A brief tutorial will be given on account set up, and how to create campaigns and ad groups. An explanation of what click through rate (CTR), conversion rates and cost per conversion are will be discussed.

There will also be an overview of Google Analytics- what it is and how it works. The Google Analytics portion of the presentation will focus primarily on e-commerce.

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: Search Engine Marketing/ AdWords
